name: CATWALK
description: Move 1 tile
detailed: Moves 1 tile either horizontally or vertically. You must move unless you are blocked on all directions.

name: CATRUN
description: Move 1 - 2 tiles
detailed: Moves 1 - 2 tiles either horizontally or vertically. You must move at least 1 tile unless you are blocked on all directions.

name: CATLEAP
description: Move 1 - 3 tiles
detailed: Moves 1 - 3 tiles either horizontally or vertically. You must move at least 1 tile unless you are blocked on all directions.

name: CATMOBILE
description: Move 1 - 4 tiles
detailed: Moves 1 - 4 tiles either horizontally or vertically. You must move at least 1 tile unless you are blocked on all directions.

name: BRISK WALK
description: Move 1 - 2 tiles and take priority for the next action only.
detailed: Move 1 - 2 tiles either horizontall or vertically and take priority for the next action only. You must move at least 1 tile unless you are blocked on all directions.

name: QUICKSTEP
description: Move 1 tile. This card can be played from hand anytime during action phase.
detailed: Moves 1 tile either horizontally or vertically. This card can be played from hand anytime during action phase. You must move unless you are blocked on all directions.

name: HOT FURBALL
description: Hit the first target player in a horizontal, vertical, diagonal direction from you.

name: STATIC BOLT
description: Deal 3 dmg to All players in a diagonal line one direction from you.

name: KATRATE
description: Deal 4 dmg to All players in a 1 tile radius around you.
detailed: Deal 4 dmg to All players in a 1 tile radius around you. This is a card with very powerful damage but lacks in range, so get real close to your enemies to make this action connect.

name: THUMBTACKS
description: Deal 1 dmg per tile moved to All players after this action is revealed.
detailed: Deal 1 dmg per tile moved to All players after this action is revealed. Players who moved before the reveal of this card do not receive the damage penalty. Best to not play move cards after this card so you don't hurt yourself

name: CATACLYSM
description: At the end of Action 3 next turn, deal 3 dmg to all enemies that are not within a 4 tile radius of you.

name: CATLING GUN
description: Deal 2 dmg in All horizontal and vertical directions to All enemies.

name: CATOMIC BOMB
description: Mark any tile on the board. At the end of Action 3 next turn, deal 3 dmg in a 2 tile radius from the marked tile to All players.
detailed: Place a bomb token on the desired tile. Can also place directly under a player, destructible, or indestructible. Players can walk over this tile.

name: DEATH STARE
description: Deal 1 dmg to a single enemy in a 4 tile radius around you.
detailed: Deal 1 dmg to a single enemy in a 4 tile radius around you. This is a weak attack but it's easy to connect thanks to its good range. Perhaps combo it with good buff cards to make it better.

name: THE CLAW
description: Deal 2 dmg to a single target in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal line that is 3 tiles from you.

name: DISINTIGRATOR
description: Target an entire row or column beside you and deal 3 dmg to all enemies there.

name: CATJAB
description: Deal 2 dmg in a 2 tile radius around you to an enemy with 5 lives or more. Otherwise, deal 1 dmg.

name: CATHAYMAKER
description: Deal 1 dmg multiplied by the action order that you played this card in a 2 tile radius around you.
detailed: Deal 1 dmg multiplied by the action order that you played this card in a 2 tile radius around you. Best to use this card on the third turn for a maximum damage of 3.

name: KATMIKAZE
description: Halve the lives (upper bound) of All players in a 2 tile radius. Skip an action to discard this card.

name: STEROIDS
description: Add 2 to your next action.
detailed: Add 2 to your next action. If the next action to this card does not have a number at the bottom left, then Steroids was wasted. Strategically combo this with move or attack cards for maximum value.

name: LAZY ROLL
description: Dodge all targeted cards during this action order only.
detailed: Dodge all targeted cards during this action order only. Damage is finalized at the end of turn. So if you revealed this card before you get attacked or after you get attacked on the same action cycle, its the same result = you were able to successfully dodge it. Timing is everything. Can dodge Cataclysm and Catomic Bomb.

name: TELEPORTATION
description: Transfer to any unoccupied tile. Must be played on Action 3. Does not count as moving.

name: TENTH LIFE
description: If you were supposed to die this turn, don’t. Remain with 1 life, activated on play even when dead.
detailed: If you were supposed to die this turn, don’t. Remain with 1 life, activated on play even when dead. If you played this card on Action Cycle 3, but was killed on Action Cycle 1, the effect of this card still activates and you are revived next turn with 1 life. But since you were killed, whatever card you played on Action Cycle 2 is no longer revealed unless it was a Tenth Life card. This card is not stackable on the same turn, activating it twice will still leave you with 1 life. If Tenth Life was discarded due to Growl or Lullaby, then Tenth Life no longer ativates and its a sad day for you.

name: CATJUTSU
description: Swap positions with a target player. Does not count as moving.

name: SAIYAN CAT
description: Trigger your next action twice.
detailed: Trigger your next action twice. Two Saiyan Cats do not stack and only works if the next card is a non-Saiyan Cat card.

name: FEEDING TIME
description: Negate All Move cards for the rest of the turn.
detailed: Negate All Move cards for the rest of the turn, including your own. Move cards can still be activated before Feeding Time was played. So if you don't want anyone to move, best to play this first.

name: REFLECTION
description: If you received dmg from an attack played this turn, deal that amount to the ones who played them.
detailed: If you received dmg from an attack played this turn, deal that amount to the ones who played them. This card does not prevent damage. Whatever amount of damage the player received is the amount of damage returned to whoever attacked them with. Works on Cataclysm and Catomic Bomb.

name: NOTHING
description: You won't perform any action.

name: SCAREDY CAT
description: You are immune to dmg but unable to deal dmg with cards this turn.
detailed: You are immune to dmg but unable to deal dmg with cards this turn. This card disables you from dealing damage the turn you played it, so playing attack cards are like playing nothing. However, if you played Event cards last turn then Scaredy cat the next turn, your damage from the Event cards would still hurt your enemies because it is from a card of a different turn. All of that while still being immune to damage from Scaredy Cat's ability, a pretty good combo to know.

name: GROWL
description: A target player discards their rightmost action.
detailed: A target player discards their rightmost action. You can only discard cards that are not revealed yet. Discarding an activated card does not undo its effects. Playing Saiyan Cat into growl makes a target player discard 2 actions leaving them with only one action for the entire turn. A nasty combo that you shouldn't know.

name: CAT LEASH
description: Move a target player 2 tiles or less.
detailed: Move a target player 2 tiles or less. You can not move yourself, only enemies.

name: COPYCAT
description: Select an action already played this turn and copy that action.
detailed: Select an action already played this turn and copy that action. You can copy any revealed card currently on the board, even powerups.

name: SNIPURR
description: Deal 9 dmg in a horizontal or vertical direction.
detailed: Deal 9 dmg in a horizontal or vertical direction. Just to be clear, yes, this card is an insta-kill. Stay out of sight.

name: LULLABY
description: All other players discard their rightmost action.
detailed: All other players discard their rightmost action.  Just a more evil version of Growl, because you affect everyone, no more choosing.

name: BODYGUARDS
description: Be immune to dmg for the entire turn.

name: HEATSEEKER
description: Deal 2 dmg to All enemies.

name: INVESTMENT
description: Replace this action with a card from your hand and play it twice.
detailed: Replace this action with a card from your hand and play it twice. Investment triggers the action twice and so does Saiyan Cat. So Saiyan Cat into Investment is stackable and triggers it four times, 2 x 2 = 4.
